name: Piconet Battler
description:
Rundown

Piconet Battler is a real-time round card battler inspired by megaman battle network.

main thing to know is that the deck editor is the S profile is the only one that will persist between updates (though you can always export more profiles to text and save them elsewhere to reimport after the update) if you make changes and dont save them they will be used while the game is running but the next "boot" they will revert to the save.

the gameplay is a huge work in progress but i have the "bones" of the game all set. so the main feedback i'm looking for now is about the overall feel and direction.

there is no difference between the in browser and the downloadable version.

Features (as of yet)
  • 3 level single player campaign
  • 6 player multiplayer (utter chaos!) (>2 players requires gamepads)
  • profile import/export (take your deck to your friend's house)
  • 7 unique cards (yeah that's not a lot i'm working on it)
